asset.author: Everlast
asset.hookText:
Join Everlast's professional fitness trainer Viktoria Telek as she goes through core workout techniques using an exercise fitness ball.
More how-to videos can be seen here: http://www.everlast.com/educationcenter
Exercise Fitness Balls can be purchased here: http://www.shopeverlast.com/inflatible-ball-pump.html
